des:
EGLO mycontrol allows Alexa to help you manage your smart products and scenes using just your voice. Voice control with EGLO mycontrol skill is easy to set up, by following the simple steps below.

Getting started: 
1. Open the Alexa app.
2. Tap on “More” > “Skills & Games > “Discover”.
3. Tap on search icon at top right of screen, and enter “EGLO mycontrol”.
4. Tap on EGLO mycontrol > “Enable To Use”
5. Type in your EGLO mycontrol username and password, then tap ‘Link Now’.
6. Select EGLO mycontrol > Link Now > Authorize.
7. Tap “Close” and follow the prompts to discover your individual devices. (Note: You can also discover devices at any time by saying “Alexa, discover devices”.)

How to Control Your EGLO mycontrol Devices

To turn your device/s or groups on or off, simply use your wake word (in most cases “Alexa”), and use the name of the device in the EGLO mycontrol app. For example, if your kitchen light is called “Kitchen” in the EGLO mycontrol app, simply say: “Alexa, turn on Kitchen”. Different EGLO mycontrol products have varying voice control features, for example, most lighting products can be dimmed, or change colour via voice control.

The Alexa app allows you to create ‘routines’ or ‘scenes’ that uses your EGLO mycontrol device/s, and can be activated through voice control. You can also discover existing scenes from the EGLO mycontrol app. For example, you might set up a routine for going to bed, “Alexa, bedtime”, which can turn off all lights. Each routine can include various different products and actions, activated with a single voice command. 

Example Voice Commands 
- Alexa, dim living room to 50% 
- Alexa, turn off kitchen
- Alexa, set the hallway light to blue 
- Alexa, turn on security lights 
- Alexa, I’m leaving for work
